item.title: The next big trend could be fragrances that help with weight loss
item.description:
When the perfume Prends-Moi was introduced in the UK in 2012, there was a waiting list of 6,000 people. Its marketing as a “slimming fragrance” is unusual, attributing this property to “betaphroline,” a plant-derived ingredient. Veld’s, the maker of Prends-Moi, suggests that a simple sniff can help curb snacking. Research firm TechNavio, in a report on the French fragrance market, highlighted the potential of slimming fragrances to boost demand. Faisal Ghaus, Vice President of TechNavio, stated that a fragrance company had introduced a slimming fragrance in France designed for weight loss...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-next-big-trend-could-be-fragrances-that-help-with-weight-loss/
